snippet.title: StormEdge - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description:
Check out action-packed gameplay, get a peek at upgrades, and more in this new trailer for StormEdge, an upcoming action roguelite game. StormEdge is heading to Early Access in Q3 2024.

StormEdge is an action-roguelite where you have to balance your desire to use powerful skills with the risk of taking damage or putting yourself in a vulnerable position. You will take the role of one of the bravest and most talented mages who is forming StormEdge – a guild whose aim is to stop the elemental storms and save the world.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
